velocity.description: Determines the speed of the falling velocity.
velocity.markdownDescription: Determines the speed of the falling velocity.

take_fall_damage.description: Determines whether the entity should take fall damage or not.
take_fall_damage.markdownDescription: Determines whether the entity should take fall damage or not.

type.description:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Modifies the falling velocity of the entity that has the power; can determine whether the entity should take fall damage or not.

Type ID: `origins:modify_falling`

!!! note

    By default, the player falls at a speed of 0.08, or 0.01 if a Slow Falling status effect is present.
